New Records: Juan Soto hit a 402-foot three-run homer off Hunter Gaddis in the 10th inning
Giancarlo Stanton hit a 446-foot two-run homer off Tanner Bibee in the 6th inning
Giancarlo Stanton moved ahead of Aaron Judge and Babe Ruth on the Yankees' career postseason home run list
Key Match Events: The game went into 10 innings before a decisive three-run homer by Juan Soto
Giancarlo Stanton's two-run homer in the 6th inning tied the score at 2-2
Emmanuel Clase rebounded from two previous losses to the Yankees with a scoreless 9th inning
Luke Weaver tamed the bottom of the Guardians order in the 10th inning to clinch the pennant
Pre-Game Insights: Manager Aaron Boone said Giancarlo Stanton is incredibly disciplined and has a strong approach to the game
The Yankees' manager emphasized the importance of strong bullpen performance
Post-Match Reflections: General partner Hal Steinbrenner said the Yankees never had doubts about their ability to win the ALCS
Manager Stephen Vogt continued to voice confidence in closer Emmanuel Clase
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Yankees made MLB's sixth-most outs at home plate during the regular season
The game was a moment 15 years in the making for the Yankees, who acquired Juan Soto last winter to return to the World Series
